attr.value: Pendrath na-Ûdun (0), The Cobalt-deeps (9), The Under-forges (6), The Pits of Angband (8)
(1st) Spawn — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one Drake hazard creature or any (non-spider) Spawnmanifestation.
A company attempting to leave this site must tap a sage or an avatar.

card.name: Arda Marred
card.text: Environment. Discard one Spring of Arda in play (your choice).Whenever an environment hazard or a magic resource is played, one token is added to one copy of Arda Marred in play (your choice). Discard 2 tokens from this card to play a hazard creature not counting against the hazard limit. If there are at least 4 tokens on this card you may discard it (at any time) to cancel an action by your opponent allowing him to take a resource from his sideboard or discard pile.

card.name: Bertok
card.text: Unique. If Skis and Fur-coats is played on his company, Bertok gains the ranger skill and he may tap to remove the effects of “attacker chooses defending characters” for an attack keyed to a region in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Echoes of Morgoth's Cry
card.text: Unique. Return one unique spawn manifestation to your hand from your discard pile and increase the hazard limit by 2. Alternatively, if Doors of Night is in play, one spawn hazard creature may be played at any Under-deeps site or surface site thereof. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

attr.value: Men — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Evermarking Scar
card.text: Playable on one of your non-Wizard characters wounded this turn by a strike from a manifestation of a unique Demon, Dragon, Maia, Nazgûl or Spawn attack. (this card may be played from your sideboard). +1 to his prowess, body and CC while a manifestation of the entity who wounded target character is in play. All body checks made by the entity resulting from strikes against target character are modified by +2. If target character is wounded he must make a CC during his organization phase modified by -4; failing this, invert this card and place him ‘off to the side” (all other effects are cancelled). Next untap phase, reinvert this card and place him at any site where the entity is located.

card.name: Fur Traders of Dyr
card.text: Unique. Playable at Olyavud if the influence check is greater than 8Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Umli (+2), Dúnedain (+1), Dwarves (+1)This faction is worth 2 mp if placed under Profitable Trade

card.name: Gostir
card.text: Unique. Cold-Dragon. Winged. May be played at Hollow Spire. 3 strikes. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Azjan, Barl Syrnac, Lhûgdalf and Ukal Sêj.

card.name: Gostir Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in Azjan, Barl Syrnac, Lhûgdalf, Mur Fostisyr and Ukal Sêj immediately faces a Cold-Dragon attack (considered a hazard creature attack) — 4 strikes at 12/7. If Doors of Night is in play, this attack also affects: Dyr, Forrhûn and Talath Oiohelka

card.name: Gostir at Home
card.text: Unique. Unless Gostir Ahunt is in play Hollow Spire has an additional automatic-attack: Cold-Dragon — 3 strikes with 15 prowess. 3 strikes. In addition, all creatures with Ice or Cold in their title have their prowess and body modified by +1; and all of these creatures with no body have 4 body.

card.name: Gostir Roused
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gostir. Playable at Hollow Spire if the influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+3) or a greater item (+6). All attacks by manifestations of Gostir against any of your companies are cancelled. Any company moving in Azjan, Barl Syrnac, Lhûgdalf, Mur Fostisyr and/or Ukal Sêj faces an attack: Cold- Dragon — 3 strikes at 14/8 prowess/body.

card.name: Hammer of Morgoth
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Darkhaven [K] Under- deeps site. Weapon. May only be borne by a Balrog. This item affects a Balrog. +1 prowess when tapping to face a strike. -1 to the body of any strike against the bearer. tap: allow a Balrog to face 2 strikes from an attack with no prowess penalty.

card.name: Hammer of the Underworld
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Two-handed. Playable at the Ancient Deep-hold or The Vaults of Utumno by an Orc or Troll leader with a prowess of at least 6. +4 EI. +1 body. Warrior only: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 10). A stored Dark Forges may be placed with this item to “restore” it. Once restored, Hammer of the Under-world gives 5 mp, 5 CP and +5 prowess (to a maximum of 12.)

card.name: Ice-king of Urd
card.text: Place on Hoarmûrath the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Kibeïdûkh; Hoarmûrath gains this site as a home site. Discard this card to take Snow-hammer from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Lassaraukar
card.text: Demon. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played keyed to Lotan; and may also be played keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R] and Shadow-holds [S] in these regions. All subsequent attacks by Lassaraukar against this company this turn receive +2 prowess and do not count against the hazard limit.

card.name: Link of Angainor
card.text: Unique. Playable at The Pits of Angband, Remains of Thangorodrim or The Vaults of Utûmno. Discard this item if it’s not borne by ahero character with a base prowess of 4 or more. tap: assign all strikes from a creature attack (regardless of characters’ status or the attack’s abilities). tap: have opponent reveal any unique creature hazards and manifestations thereof from his hand (or else his whole hand). Choose one of these cards: opponent must either discard it or the prowess and body of any of its attacks are reduced by 3 this turn.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment).
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Orcs — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against overt companies)
Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Dyr; Lhûgdalf; Ukal Sêj. Ancient Dwarf-ruin. Any non-unique gold ring or jewel is playable at this site.

card.name: Morgoth's Ring
card.text: Unique. Playable only if Doors of Night is in play. Counts as 3 against the hazard limit. All players may play hazard long-events placing them under this card: playing such a card costs 2 against the hazard limit. All hazards under this card are not discarded normally at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase. Additionally, any player may discard 2 hazards from his hand (at any time) to cancel an effect that would discard Morgoth’s Ring or cards placed under it. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted (this effect cannot be cancelled). When this card is discarded, all hazard long-events under it are discarded.

card.name: Northern Wyrms
card.text: Unique. Playable by a Dragon at a site where you have stored at least 5 greater and/or major items if the influence check is greater than 12. All your characters receive +1 prowess while at or moving to a site in the Northern Waste.

attr.value: (1st) Trap — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Undead — 2 strikes with 8 prowess. Each character wounded must make a CC
Contains a hoard. Any non-unique Undead creature can be keyed to this site.
(1st) Trap — 2 strikes with 7 prowess (2nd) Undead — 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC
Contains a hoard. Any non-unique Undead creature can be keyed to this site.

card.name: Ologong
card.text: Unique. Olog-hai. Leader. Manifestation of The Iron Troll. Discard on a body check result of 9. +5 EI against Orcs and Trolls. When he is at Shapal Udûn you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. May only be brought into play at his home site; if in your starting company, you must start the game at his home site.

attr.value: (1st) Traps — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess;(2nd) Men — 3 strikes with 9 prowess(detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Orcs of the Barl Syrnac
card.text: Ice-orcs. Playable at a tapped or untapped site in Azjan, Barl Syrnac, Lhûgdalf or Ukal Sêj if the influence check is greater than 8Standard Modifications: Ice-orc (+2) You may play Roam the Waste as if you were a Balrog player (Strangling Coils need not be in play); it only affects your companies containing an Ice-orc. Cannot be duplicated at a given site

attr.value: no surface site, The Pits of Angband (5), The Drowning-deeps (9)
(1st) Drake — 2 strikes with 12 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatick-attack one hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c].

Only non-unique orc and troll characters may be brought into play at this site, unless the character has Shapal Udûn as its home site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.

card.name: Snow-hammer
card.text: Unique. Playable on Hoarmûrath at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Northern Waste (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Hoarmûrath; he gains the warrior skill and is not taken to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. tap: Bitter Cold may be shuffled back into play deck instead of discarding it from play.

card.name: Spring of Arda
card.text: Environment. Discard one Arda Marred in play (your choice). Whenever an environment resource or spell is played, one token is added to one copy of Spring of Arda in play (your choice). Discard two tokens from this card to let a hazard creature cost two against the hazard limit. If there are at least four tokens on this card you may discard it (at any time) to cancel an action by your opponent allowing him to take a hazard from his sideboard or discard pile.

card.name: The Dark Roads
card.text: Black player only. Ringwraith characters may use Under-deeps movement (unless they are in Fell-rider mode). tap: take Far Below the Deepest Delvings from your discard pile to your hand. You may play this card with your starting company in lieu of a minor item and start the game at The Sulfur-deeps or The Under- courts.

card.name: The Iron Troll
card.text: Unique. Troll. 1 strike. Manifestation of Ologong. May be played keyed to Shapal Udûn and Azjan. May also be played keyed to any Under-deep Shadow-hold [S].

card.name: The Sled-horde
card.text: Unique. Playable at Urdic Camp if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Hoarmûrath (+3), any other Man faction playable in the Northern Waste (-2). tap: allow any covert company travelling in the Northern Waste to move 1 additional region.

card.name: Ulvûn the Owl Keeper
card.text: Unique. -1 prowess against Wolves. +2 EI against the Fur Traders of Dyr faction. Tap Ulvun to heal one Noble Hound he controls.

card.name: Unhappy World
card.text: Playable if there are at least 4 Demon and Spawn cards in play. Minion allies lose all movement restrictions. Discard if there are fewer than 3 Spawn cards in play or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Wargs of the Tundra
card.text: Unique. Playable at Númenorean Tomb if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: if you are Dwar or Hoarmûrath (+3), any other Wolf faction in play (-2). You may play Our Own Wolves without the presence of a spirit-magic using character (no CC is required).
